meanings.definition: To write more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outwrites her classmates in essays.
meanings.sent2: He outwrites his friends when it comes to writing stories.
meanings.sent3: The student who outwrites the others gets a gold star.
meanings.sent4: Her pen outwrites all others, filling pages with ease.
meanings.sent5: The author's dedication to outwrites all competition, making her a bestseller.

meanings.sent1: With practice, she outwrites her peers in creative writing.
meanings.sent2: He outwrites everyone in the class with his exceptional storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The young writer outwrites the old author, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination outwrites reality, creating worlds beyond belief.
meanings.sent5: His talent for storytelling outwrites any doubts about his success in the future.
